channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13645] Beeline needs null-guard around hiveVars and hiveConfVars read
item.description: Beeline has a bug wherein if a user does a !save ever, then on next load, if beeline.hiveVariables or beeline.hiveconfvariables are empty, i.e. {} or unspecified, then it loads it as null, and then, on next connect, there is no null-check on these variables leading to an NPE.
item.summary: Beeline needs null-guard around hiveVars and hiveConfVars read

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: thejas, could you please take a look - this is a near-trivial patch.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12801302/HIVE-13645.patch
